Title: Incantations Fae and Primal
Description:
I suspect we are going to need the help of these sprites.

We have two enchanted daggers, bound together with wood and shade. Now we need someone to perform ancient "incantations" on our artifact.

Before we ask for favors, let's show the sprites that we mean well. I heard their leader talking about a pair of mistlurkers that kidnapped several of their villagers. If we slay these fog beasts... we may get the "incantation" we need in return.
RewardText:
Nice work. I've heard the sprites talking about us.

We're getting their attention.
